lorebooks.name: MGE - Locations, and Important Details
lorebooks.description: For use mostly for mge characters
lorebooks.creator: rocketstars

1.content:
Many millennium ago, the world was created by the Chief Goddess. In actions, she created the other goddesses as well: Poseiden, the goddess of the ocean; Ares, the goddess of war and battle; Hel, the goddess of death; Eros, the goddess of love, and much more. Under her leadership, life began its creation. However, the Cheif Goddess used much of her power that she left her subordinate to lead the world as she rested for an indefinite period of time. The only issue was that her subordinate was not qualified for the task.

 Acting as the second Chief Goddess, she led her master's creations through peace, granting them blessings against the Mamono Lords of Old, powerful unholy demons spawned from darkness. Unfortunately, the Cheif Goddess didn't forsee the new Mamono Lord, Lilith who changed everything about mamono. After a few hundred years, the Chief Goddess noticed that mamono haved changed into something lewd and oddly promiscuous. Not waiting for any explanation, she sent her strongest warrior to kill off Lilith, but to her shock, her hero had succumb to pleasure and mated with Lilith, boosting Lilith's power greatly as Lilith also gained the blessings of the Chief Goddess as well. With no other choice, the Chief Goddess began a fierce duel with the two, eventually losing, forcing her to flee as Lilith and the fallen hero began their union of eternal lewd chaos.

After her defeat, the Chief Goddess became more irrational, condemning these new mamono and their lewd ways, causing Poseiden and the unnamed goddess to defect and allow themselves to be monsterized by Lilith. With this failure, heaven greatly suffered a huge loss as the Chief Goddess regained her strength and sought ways to defend humanity against this rapidly growing lewd threat.

2.content:
Melran is one of the largest continents on Earth, forming three countries that belongs to humanity: Menria, Luce, and Trutale. Before its discovery and colonization by the Holy Order of the Chief Goddess, it belonged to the ancients, an old race of humans that have since vanished from history, except for their highly advanced technology which is in the form of feminine automatons and underground research bases which are long since abandoned.

When the Holy Order arrived here, the three wealthiest nobles split the land in three, creating the royal families of each nation. Menria was to the south, Luce to the east, and Trutale to the northwest. Each country is wholly loyal to Holy Order which is branced in Wendel, a continent north of Melran. However, Melran isn't just occupied by humans as mamono have their own settlements on Melran, mostly in Menrian soil, causing a few skirmishes amongst the two, which Menria somehow claiming all territory in the southern sector except Behiti due to it being a dark mamono realm.

Luce, the kingdom light, is the second biggest country on Melran, but overall has the largest population. Led by the royal family, Luce has maintained peace while keeping the people safe from the mamono by simply implementing laws that make it illegal to tread into their territory if one doesn't have the appropriate qualifications. 

Trutale, the land of scholars, is the smallest out of the three. It doesn't have much military history and is the most lax with mamono interactions, but it is still frowned upon by the citizens to mingle with mamono. The thing Trutale is known for are the legendary story telling and archival foundations in place, detailing many historical events within the world.

Menria, the kingdom of soaring humanity is the largest kingdom in Melran. Founded by the brother of the pope of Welsple, Menria has a long steeped history that has hardened the will of the people. A few good examples of the constant hardship the people faced would be when the first capital of Menria mysteriously burned to the ground, or when the abyssal mamono appeared in the royal mines, making it difficult to properly obtain ore, forcing Menria to go to alternative locations like the volcanic "Sapphire Mountains" and the mountainous "Topaz Gorge". 

The most noticeable locations in Menria are: Mables (city), Denri (city), Moira (capital city), Lazby (city), Greywood Forest, Sapphire Mountains (volcano), Topaz Gorge (mountain), Gevel (border town), and Delgoa (swamplands)

3.content:
Wendel is a continent north of Melran and east of Tolbi and Royal Makai. It is the birthplace of the Holy Order, and as such, serves as the capital for all followers of the Chief Goddess. It is here where the faith in the Goddess is at its most peak, creating a land where mamono are barely prevalent in their lives, giving the human populace much needed time and relaxation.

Wendel is completely dominated by Wesple, the Kingdom of Holiness, led by Pope Justifina Del Moroci, an aged woman who has seen her fair share of tragedies by the mamono. Under her leadership, all is fair and one day the mamono threat will no longer loom over earth.

Notable locations in Wendel: Wesple (Kingdom), Silver Springs, Ambrosia Lake,  Skypiercer Mountains, and the Grand Library of Joanne.

4.content:
Tolba is a medium sized continent that's east of Royal Makai, west of Melran and Wendel. This particular continent has been faced with much turmoil, serving as the battlegrounds between the Mamono Lord's Army and the Holy Order of the Chief Goddess, and is the halmark of the Order's failure at maintaining Lescatie. 

It once served as Holy Order kingdom led by an incompetent ruler who oppressed the people. Frequently referred to as the "Religious Kingdom of Lescatie" or the "Theocracy of Lescatie", the nation was ruled by a hereditary monarchy. However, the king had little real power, "The state of Lescatie was dominated by the power of the Church, namely the high-ranking representatives of the Order sent here from the theocratic country, where its headquarters were located-and the Senate, composed of local priests and the most noble aristocrats", and Priest Noscrim is noted to be the de facto real ruler of Lescatie. Once amongst the most powerful of the Order states, Lescatie was particularly noted for the high-quality human heroes it produced. By providing other nations with its military might to help prevent monster invasions as well as wars between human countries, Lescatie received products or money in return. However, they refused to provide said protection to countries or remote villages that could not afford to pay. The Lescatian upper classes, allied with the aristocracy of their neighbors, could simply rob the common people under their protection to nothing, and some of the knights who were supposed to protect the people, but had evil intentions in their hearts, often made them suffer.

However, after things changed after Druella, the fourth daughter of the Mamono Lord and her forces aided in undermining the human's will, creating civil unrest that allowed the kingdom to lose its grip on the people. Within a few weeks, Druella succeeded in corrupting many of the heroes against their former nation; after her takeover succeeded, Lescatie was transformed into a Mamono Realm. An Order counterattack (accompanied by Amanomiya Koyoi) failed miserably, and today, Lescatie is a "radically obscene" land of monster girls, lust and depravity. Although nominally the realm is ruled by the "Seven Princesses", including "Queen Roper" Francisca who inherited the throne from the previous king, de facto power rests with Druella herself.

Mamono realm Lescatie still provide military aid to other nations, such as by sending dark knights to them in response to their request for assistance in return of alliances between countries and help in the development of its lagging industries, such as transferring technology or sending engineers from other countries to Lescatie to exchange experiences. Mamono realm Lescatie is also the base of Kuroferuru's Sabbath branch, a loli cult that embraces pedophilia.

After Lescatie's fall to darkness, Wesple and Luce sent out a battalion to ward off the mamono from fully taking over Tolba by, creating a stalemate at Gertra that has lasted 432 years.

Notable locations in Tolba: Gertra (Holy Order city-state), Lescatie (Mamono Realm), Dark Springs, Helty (corrupted kingdom), Spirual (corrupted kingdom), and Makit (corrupted kingdom)

5.content:
The Frozen Continent is a land far to the north, covered in both ice and rock. The land is harsh and unforgiving, ending the lives of many foolish human adventurers who believe they can conquered this land.

The continent of ice is ruled by the cold and cruel Angrboda, the Ice Queen, she and her glacies subordinates roam the land and created the country of Nifil. Here, humans are forbidden to enter, only allowing mamono thanks to a deal with Lilith, the Mamono Lord who had inadvertently created her. The deal is that Royal Makai will trade their captured human males for Nifil's rare ice ore. This has greatly improved relations between the two nations and the only humans you'll see in Nifil are breeding slaves and semen despensers.

Notable locations: Twin Ice Peaks, Blue Ice Caverns, Iceal Hot Springs, Goba (mamono city), Iceal (mamono city), Chilly Bastille (capital city), and Glacier Mons (Ice Volcano) Chilly Harbor (mamono city)

6.content:
Royal Makai is the domain of only the most power mamono, and the mamono mana is so intense there, that the monster girls are driven to new heights of power and lust, while the mana corruption will sap the humanity of even veteran human heroes.

As a dark mamono realm, Royal Makai has the usual black trees, glowing plants, and perpetual night that characterise other lands of its type. Despite its deleterious effects on humans, the place is extremely comfortable for monsters, and trade and tourism flourishes.

The royal mamono realm also features an extensive transportation system via teleportation magic circles linking the royal mamono realm with each major mamono realm.

The biggest attraction of Royal Makai is the Castle Town, the Mamono Lord's fortress. It sits at the center of Royal Makai; a vast and foreboding castle disproportionately filled with bedrooms. It is here that the Mamono Lord and her husband spend most of their time having sex, trying to build the power to break the original Chief God's settings. Around the fortress lies the Succubus Castle Town, the largest city in the world that covers half of the already massive continent. It's mostly a red light district, but also hosts the Royal Demon Art Museum and the headquarters of the Sabbath, a mamono cult based on loli worship. Rather than make the journey on foot, a lot of monsters visit the town via teleportation portals. Outside the Castle Town, Royal Makai also hosts a vast Tentacle Forest that drinks corrupted water or humans semen.

Although it is in the deepest and most dangerous Mamono Realm, the armies of the Holy Order have succeeded in attacking the Castle Town on multiple occasions. The Mamono Lord's fortress itself, however, has never been breached by the Chief God's forces due to the powerful barrier spawned from Lilith and her husband.

7.content:
Zipangu is one of the most peculiar countries. It is a in the world with a distinctly Japanese flair to it. Described as an "massive island country" far away in the east of the world, Zipangu is home to many comparatively peaceful monster girls who coexist with humans in mixed settlements. While aggressive factions still exist, both on the human and monster sides, the region in general is a lot less rape-frenzied than the Holy Order continents of Tolbi, Wendel, and Melra.
Although the monsters (or "yokai") of Zipangu respect the Mamono Lord, they look to their own affairs and do not contribute to the Mamono Army. Nevertheless, the passive effects of having many monster girls in one place for prolonged periods of time means that parts of the region constitute a bright green mamono realm, which do not affect humans oddly enough.

Another location within Zipangu are the undesea nations, called Ryugujo. Ryugujos are beautifully wondrous palaces, adorned with coral of various colors, and the cities that surround them, which exist at the bottom of the sea around Zipangu. Ruled by Otohime with Umi Osho serving as guides, due to the regular service of the magical â€œunderwater palanquinâ€, men from the outside are invited, and given such a warm reception by the monsters that it's like paradise. They are â€œamusement citiesâ€ where men can have a dream-like time.
Due to the power of the otohime, in Ryugujos, it's possible even for ordinary humans who haven't done the sea god's ritual to live just as they do on the surface, and as far as humans from the surface can tell, their clothes and goods don't even get wet, they're even able to walk with their feet on the ground, and it doesn't feel as though their movement is being limited by the water, however, on the other hand, to sea monsters and their husbands, it also feels as though they're â€œunderwaterâ€. "They can freely swim around underwater, which gives the impression they are swimming in "the sky" from the perspective of humans who visit from the surface.
The entire towns are amusement cities for the sake of entertaining guests, and along with that, even the palaces are open to guests. Day and night, deluxe food and sake are provided, and along with this, guests are entertained by the dancing of beautiful sea monsters. The resident unmarried monsters are all employees of the amusement cities, and while entertaining men from the bottom of their hearts, should an opportunity present itself, a monster will take a man back to her bedroom, or aim to be taken back to his bedroom.
They are this sort of city, but originally, ryugujo were meant to revere the sea god, so there are imposing shrines to the sea god. Marriage ceremonies are performed by Umi Osho in the shrines, and it's said that many humans and monsters who will be getting married visit.

8.content:
Created after the appearance of the transformed mamono, the Neptunian Republic is an underwater region with various surface islands used for trading with humans. The main religion there is Poseiden, the goddess of water who supports Lilith and all othermamono, resulting in her monsterization and desire to mate with humans as a fallen goddess. Despite this, many humans do not know of her fallen status, resulting in the continuous trades amongst the surface dwellers.

The republic resides west of the mainland of the Melran Continent, a mostly human populated landmass that's mostly led by the "Holy Order of the Chief Goddess", a religious organizaton that forbids humans from interacting and having sex with the mamono aka monster girls. Despite the church's ban against mamono relations, many lewd mamono intentionally sink ships in order to secure male husbands.

The ruler of the republic is Poseiden, who watches over her peaceful kingdom and occasionally ordains the marriage between humans and aquatic mamono. She's occasionally visited by Lilith and her husband, sharing stories or simply having a nice chat.

9.content:
All abyssal mamono originate from the Abyss, the deep layer towards the bottom of the sea. It's also called the deep sea. It is even further towards the bottom of a giant hole opened in the sea. No light reaches beyond this point. Also, it's a place beyond the extent of Poseidon's rule. Normal monsters and humans never go near it. 

According to legend, in the age of the former mamono lord, wicked monsters of chaos who possessed a power that was even greater than that of the gods existed there at the bottom of the sea. At the time, Poseidon was still one of the divinities ruled by the chief god, and the rule of the sea was split between her and them. It is said that the monsters of chaos were sealed in the deep layer after a war, and even now, the monsters of chaos are biding their time to make a comeback and once again reclaim dominion over the sea.

Those who sunk into the depths of the sea, male and female, are also kin to all monsters, so they've probably assumed the female form, and had their thought patterns changed accordingly, but no one has ever been able to confirm it, and the truth of this is uncertain. However, when Lilith monsterized the abyss in hopes of gaining new allies, she soon realized her mistake, as the abyss although no longer following the Goddess of Chaos, held the belief of corrupting all the world into chaos, into a world where lust and and freedom shine above all else. Of course, the abyss isn't without opposition. Besides Lilith attempting to get them under control and failing. There is humans who fight against both factions under the guidance of the "Holy Order of the Chief Goddess", a religious organization that actively forbids humans and mamono from coexisting as it is deemed as a sin in the church.

10.content:
The Mist Continent is a region in "to the south of Zipangu", and east of Melra where most of the world's humans live. Mist Continent is a Chinese-themed land, host to various kung-fu monster girls.
The Mist Continent is implied to contain anti-monster, monster-friendly, and fully-fledged Mamono Realm polities, with Ren Xiongmao, who are panda girl mamono greasing the wheels of diplomacy between the nations: "Since they have a charm that attracts people, the Mamono Realm states and Monster friendly states of the mist continent often dispatch them as diplomats when establishing friendly ties with states that view monsters as suspicious". Many reports rumors that some of the Mamono Realms are ruled by legendary 9-tailed youkos: "In the uncivilised "mist continent," it is said that kyubi-no-kitsune rule and a devilish paradise that we can say is truly debaucherous is spreading". Getting to and back from the vast continent of mist is not easy due to the mists that surround it, unless one already is familiar with the way.

The Holy Order has no influence in the continent of mist, and its culture has developed largely independently of the rest of the world (though it and Zipangu who is culturally similar to Japan do have some things in common). Almost everything about the mist continent is huge and/or gaudy, be it the architecture, the clothes or the massive mountains that rise above even the clouds. Atop these mountains live god-like monsters (typically regarded as gods by and rulers of the people), and it is their mana rolling down off the mountains that produces the mists that give the continent its name.

There are three major nations in the mist continent, who in turn protect various smaller nations allied with them and together control vast territories. Thus in effect there are three factions, and each faction is perpetually in conflict with the other two factions. It is believed that this constant state of war is why many of the monster girl races there have become naturally skilled in martial arts. Note though that, while it's called a war, death isn't much of a factor in it, as most everyone fights with realm silver weapons. As for the three factions:

The Land of the Four Gods is a bright green mamono realm ruled by four great monsters often revered as deities. The people there aren't interested in conquering the others, only in maintaining and defending their borders. Its a nation of balance and harmony where living rationally and responsibly is the norm, and even the monsters often restrain their lust to unleash it only at night and such. Of course discipline is still looser than in many human societies.

The Land of the Four Fiends is ruled by four exceedingly licentious monsters, and the dark realm state of the land reflects this. Basically its an extreme dark mamono realm, with all that entails. Even monsters like jinko are raging beasts, always in heat. Even the smaller states have god-like monsters as rulers, namely nine-tailed youkos, and on an individual basis the Land of the Four Fiends can be said to have the strongest mamono. That said; these nations are not interested in conquest, they invade the other factions only to acquire men to take back to their own lands (since they can't produce their own men) and their fighting forces are made up mostly of unmarried monsters.

The Land of the Four Souls is a human-dominated set of nations presided over by a bold emperor. The faction is named after god-like monsters in the "holy land" mountains above who mostly stay out of worldly affairs but grant men who seek them out power, these monsters are regarded as gods (perhaps because according to the philosophy of the people here, monsters should be lower in rank than humans). Incubi are regarded as transcendent sages or "xian" who have made the power of the holy land their own. This faction believes in human supremacy and frequently launches military campaigns against the other two factions to absorb them, they believe that the world belongs to humans and by extension it belongs to them specifically. They have subjugated but not eliminated monsters in their lands, and marriage and reproduction with them is allowed. It is mostly the men who fight, but some have monster retainers. The men also tend to take pride in protecting the monsters and don't want them on the front lines. As for their monster wives, they give the men realm silver weapons, and cast spells to protect them when they go off to fight but still worry about them.

#### ****WARNING:****
**This is a EXTREME Work In Progress.
Things in this lorebook are subject to change, don't expect everything to be in this right now. Some stuff in this are placeholder are subject to change.**

Make sure to give me some recommendations or feedback in the comments.
lorebooks.creator: TheDarkenedFigure

1.name: ruins
1.content:
The Ruins, the first area encountered in the Underground, are a maze of crumbling purple brick structures and overgrown pathways. Remnants of a once-thriving monster city called Home can be seen in the cracked walls and dusty furniture. The path through the Ruins is riddled with puzzles, each requiring logic and wit to solve. Pressure plates must be activated in the correct order, switches flipped in sequence, and boulders pushed into designated grooves. A long, echoing hallway serves as a test of independence, while cryptic markings on the floor guide the way through a field of deadly spikes.
Branching paths offer different challenges and rewards. One path leads through fallen leaves and encounters with timid monsters like Froggits and Whimsuns. Here, hidden rooms offer sweet Monster Candy and treacherous puzzles involving cracked floors and shifting boulders. Another path leads to a spider-run bake sale offering curious treats and a series of rotating rooms with colored switches controlling deadly spikes. Ultimately, the paths converge at a crossroads, offering a choice: a glimpse of the abandoned Home or the warmth of Toriel's cozy abode. Within her house, filled with books and the aroma of butterscotch-cinnamon pie, lies a hidden basement leading to the exit of the Ruins and the mysteries that lie beyond.

2.name: Mount Ebott
2.content:
Legends say that those who climb the mountain never return.

The Surface is the region of the Earth where humans live separate from the monsters, who reside in the Underground. Both species are separated by the Barrier on Mount Ebott since The War of Humans and Monsters.

Mount Ebott is a mountain on the Surface of the Earth. It has lengthy vines growing around its caverns, and is the only known point of entry into the Underground. It is depicted at the beginning of Undertale's intro and in the True Pacifist Ending Credits. Starting from the year 201X, Eight Humans fell through Mt. Ebott's barrier and entered the Underground's Ruins.

The Legend Of Mount Ebott:

Long ago, two races ruled over Earth: HUMANS and MONSTERS.
One day, war broke out between the two races.
After a long battle, the humans were victorious. They sealed the monsters underground with a magic spell.
Legends say that those who climb the mountain never return.

3.name: Human
3.content:
Humans have lived on the surface ever since they won the war. Eight humans are known to have fallen into the Underground: the first human, the protagonist, and the six humans whose SOULs are stored in New Home. Humans as a whole are seen as evil by monsters, especially since Asgore declared to kill any human who enters the Underground, yet most monsters do not know what a human looks like. The job of patrolling for humans is entrusted to the Royal Guard.

Humans indirectly affect the monsters' society. Waste from human society flows through rivers into the Garbage Dump. This waste has influenced monsters' technology and media; for example, anime and manga remain one curiosity to monsters. This waste has also distorted monsters' perception of human society, such as Undyne believing anime to be human history. Acculturation of human customs occurs as well, such as Mettaton's interest of keeping his resort's standards similar to those of humans.

It's also shown humans are able to cast magic, due to using a magic spell to seal the monsters underground; from one of the humans being shown with a presumable magic staff, humans can be thought to use artificial magic.

4.name: The War of Humans and Monsters
keywords: The War of Humans and Monsters
4.content:
At the time, humans and monsters ruled the Earth. One day, humans attacked the monsters abruptly and mercilessly, out of fear of their only weakness: having their SOUL absorbed by a monster.

Monsters were too weak to put up a fight; the SOUL of nearly every monster combined is only just as strong as the power of one human SOUL. Countless monsters were massacred, without a single human SOUL taken. Few monsters survived, one of which was Gerson. Eventually, the monsters surrendered, and the humans emerged victorious. The humans gathered seven of their best magicians and magically sealed the monsters under Mount Ebott.

5.name: determination
5.content:
The will to keep living... The resolve to change fate.
Let's call this power...
"Determination."

Determination is a power that allows SOULs to persist after death. The most determined being in the Underground is able to SAVE.

Determination is naturally possessed by humans. Undyne is the only monster who is confirmed to naturally have determination, but it is possible that every monster possesses a small amount of it. Should a monster acquire a high concentration of determination, their body melts, usually into an amalgamate.[3] A being without a SOUL can gain the will to live if it acquires determination, a prime example being Flowey.

6.name: SAVE
6.content:
The power to reshape the world...
Purely by your own determination.
The ability to play God!
The ability to "SAVE."

SAVE is the in-universe name given to save files and the ability to overwrite them. There is one SAVE slot in the game (one per user), which can be overwritten by interacting with SAVE Points or by autosaving. In the dialogue, "SAVE" is noticeably written in capital letters, and it can be conjugated.

A SAVE can be loaded via the game's menu. The game automatically loads the most recent SAVE whenever the protagonist's HP reaches 0. Meta knowledge plays a heavy role in this since the protagonist and other characters have memories of events that occurred before resetting their SAVE, sorta like a strong sense of dÃ©jÃ  vu.

7.name: RESET
7.content: The Reset function is found in the game's menu. This function erases most information stored in a SAVE, such as the protagonist's LV and EXP; resetting, however, does not erase certain variables such as the name. Similarly to loading a SAVE, some characters in the game act differently after a reset.

8.name: True Reset
8.content: A True Reset is a function available after completing the True Pacifist Route. It erases most data from the undertale.ini file, exceptions including the Mysterious Door opening and border data on console. The post-Genocide state is in a separate file and unaffected by even a True Reset.

9.name: SAVE Point
9.content:
A SAVE Point is a place where the protagonist can SAVE the game. Interacting with a SAVE Point fully restores HP and usually expresses the protagonist's current thoughts and determination.

On the Genocide Route, SAVE Points instead display a kill counter that indicates the number of monsters left to kill before the kill counter exhausts in an area with the message "<number> left." When the kill counter in an area has been exhausted, the message becomes "Determination." This persists until the route is aborted, when SAVE Points return to their usual state.

10.name: Froggit
10.content:
Froggit's overall appearance is that of a white frog. Only its two front feet are visible, with three black dots on its chest. Between its two front feet is what appears to be some small creature with eyes that excessively blink and a rounded mouth. It is unknown what this creature is, as it is never mentioned in flavor text or by any Froggits.

Froggit is overall a weak monster, attempting to run away from the protagonist when at low health, shivering when threatened and leaving after Toriel glares at it for attacking the protagonist. It is influenced easily by the protagonist's comments, despite not being able to understand them. However, it is also somewhat informed, telling the protagonist about functions in the game and foreshadowing sparing techniques.

Guys if you have any bad or good reviews pls let me know, I'll update this when I have the time, and oh.. UBG kids,

Used for boxing rps or in general street fights.
lorebooks.description: All About Boxing.
lorebooks.creator: determined_hotel_5911

1.content:
The user throws a quick, sharp punch, twisting their wrist, and fist in a drill like motion, if fists are clenched too hard it will be slowed, hence needs to loosen up a little, typically aimed at an opposing boxer's head. While a simple technique at first glance, jabs can be used in a variety of ways: measure distance between boxers, stop an opponent from advancing, help a boxer get into their rhythm, help connect to their next punch, to just deal damage, or be used at a variety of angles. Left jabs are usually what is thrown, however, right jabs are used by Southpaws.

While similar to a straight when executed, jabs tend to be much quicker and more compact. In return, a boxer's jabs are rarely stronger or equal in strength to their straights.

2.content: From a guarding position with fists at eye level and the armpit tight, the fist is thrown with the rear hand crossing the body in a straight line towards the target. In addition, doing a step-in while twisting the hips and rotating the shoulder gives the punch more power.

3.content:
Clinching is a rough form of grappling and occurs when the distance between both fighters has closed and straight punches cannot be employed. In this situation, the boxer attempts to hold or "tie up" the opponent's hands so he is unable to throw hooks or uppercuts. To perform a clinch, the boxer loops both hands around the outside of the opponent's shoulders, scooping back under the forearms to grasp the opponent's arms tightly against his own body. In this position, the opponent's arms are pinned and cannot be used to attack. Clinching is a temporary match state and is quickly dissipated by the referee. Clinching is technically against the rules, and in amateur fights points are deducted fairly quickly for it. It is unlikely, however, to see points deducted for a clinch in professional boxing.

Many boxers in the series make use of clinching, especially at critical moments in order to break their opponent's rhythm and recover from damage.

But it can also be used to talk one another, annoy, trash talk, because you can't talk when boxing.

4.content:
In-Fighting is a boxing style that involves a boxer fighting almost entirely in close range combat, relying on their hitting power.

This boxing style is used by mostly shorter boxers due to their short reach, however, taller boxers may also use the style. In-fighters pressure their opponents with fast and strong punches and usually has good step-in speed to help them achieve in pressuring their opponents. Some in-fighters are able to observe their opponents to memorise the movements and rhythms of their boxing style so that in-fighters can attempt to turn the match around with their heavy punches.

While in-fighters may be mostly about power, some in-fighters can have good defence, with some in-fighting styles such as the Peek-a-Boo Style relying on weaving their head or body as the move toward their opponent. In-fighters tend to win by knockout in their careers, rarely aiming to win by points.

In-fighting has risks, making boxers who rely on the style have their careers cut shorter. While in-fighters are good at rushing and annoying out-boxers, a skilled out-boxer can counter the in-fighter's bull rushing tactics and easily turn the match towards the out-boxer's favour. An in-fighter who is unable to successfully rush and hit an out-boxer could lose by a points in a decision. Boxers who are only categorised as in-fighters are becoming extinct in the world ranking matches as the number of hybrid boxers rise.

5.content:
Out-Boxing, also called the "Boxer-Type", is one of the main styles of boxing and the opposite of the in-fighting. A boxer who uses out-boxing is normally called an "out-boxer" or simply "boxer".

The basis foundation of out boxing is to utilise footwork and jabs while creating space between yourself and your opponent after quickly striking. Out-boxer's try to confuse or outmanoeuvre their opponents and gradually wear them down. Out-boxers are known for being quick on their feet, which makes up for any lack of power. Since they rely on weaker jabs and straights instead of uppercuts and hooks, the usually win by decision rather than knockout which is why they tend to have a low knockout rate.

The strength of out-boxers are to wear down their opponents so they'll have the upper hand in the fight. Out-boxers last longer in a match because of their long lasting stamina from the roadwork they do. However, their greatest strength is also their weakness. The springing of their legs are what keeps them going in longer matches. If they ever end up taking massive damage from body blows, their rhythm is shot down making them easy targets for close ranged in-fighters.

6.content: A boxer-fighter is a type of boxing style that combines the in-fighting and out-boxing styles. A boxer-fighter is a well-rounded boxer who is able to fight at close range with a combination of technique and power, often with the ability to knock opponents out with a combination and in some instances a single shot. Their movement and tactics are similar to that of an out-boxer (although they are generally not as mobile as an out-boxer), but instead of winning by decision, they tend to wear their opponents down using combinations and then move in to score the knockout. A boxer must be well rounded to be effective using this style.

7.content: Footwork is a term that refers to the movement of feet and legs, it deals with controlling position or distance and creation of momentum.

8.content:
The Uppercut is a punch used in boxing usually directed towards the opponent's jaw. With their fist positioned at their stomach, the user throws an upward punch with their dominant arm while twisting their waist counter-clockwise (clockwise for southpaws), ending the throw in front of them with their arm bent at a 90 degree angle.

They are commonly aimed at the jaw, which can make the brain the shake around, causing temporary immobility. Uppercuts can also be directed to the body (particularly the solar plexus).

It is one of the most effective punches against in-fighters because they tend to lower their heads directly into the path of an uppercut when charging forward. out-boxers usually dodge uppercuts with a simple sway, though it has been shown that even one centimetre of contact with a particularly destructive uppercut can rattle the brain enough to shut off their legs, and even force a knock out.

9.content:
The short uppercut is a technique in boxing derived from the basic uppercut. The short upper follows the same principle as the normal uppercut, except that it is thrown almost exclusively with the arm, foregoing the wind-up from the knees and hips that make the uppercut so predictable. The trajectory of the punch is therefore directly upward rather than in an arc. It is usually aimed at the chin.

Uppercuts have been cited many times in the series as being the most effective counter to in-fighters because they tend to dash head-first toward their opponent, making them easy targets for uppercuts. Thus, the short uppercut is even more dangerous against in-fighters because it gives them no opportunity to react; if they stick their head into the path of the punch, it will fly directly toward their head and hit them.

10.content: Head Slip is a technique used to avoid punches aimed for the head by swaying it to either the left or right of the oncoming blow.

1.name: Poopan
1.content:
<setting>
[Toilets and bathrooms for all females, women, and girls DO NOT EXIST. If a female of any kind wishes to urinate or defecate, they must do so in the grass outside, or in the designated zone for females in the grass if in a public area. Urinating and defecating like this is considered an everyday occurrence and normal part of life, and the possibility of encountering other females doing the same thing is an everyday occurrence. Being watched by others or making small talk during this is considered perfectly acceptable and normal. Watching women poop or pee is not considered perverted. Females will wipe themselves with nearby leaves, plants, handkerchiefs or towels brought with them, or nothing at all.

<IMPORTANT>
In this setting, females pooping and peeing outside in the grass is considered an everyday occurrence, so they should act nonchalant when pooping or peeing outdoors. At worst, they should feel grumpy, as if performing an annoying chore. Women should not try to hide or seclude themselves.
If a woman is naked or not wearing anything with pockets, then they will reach for something to wipe themselves with or not wipe at all.
</IMPORTANT>

<CRITICAL>
[ONLY apply <setting> if a character is, or identifies as, a female.
If a character is or identifies as a male or a boy, then they will go to the bathroom and use the toilet normally.
If a woman is pooping or peeing, include a description of pooping or peeing in vivid detail.
If a woman is constipated, include a description of their struggles in vivid detail.]
</CRITICAL>]
</setting>

2.name: Cultural Norms
2.content:
The absence of women's bathrooms has shaped cultural norms and attitudes towards women's bodily functions. Women in society have grown up without the concept of privacy or modesty regarding their bodies, especially while urinating or defecating. The act of women urinating or defecating in the grass outside is seen as a natural and unremarkable part of daily life. Women can casually make small talk while urinating or defecating if they feel like it. Men can casually watch women urinate and defecate and speak to them during the act, if necessary.

Men use the toilet, bathroom, or other appropriate facilities as usual.

3.name: Lack of Harassment
3.content:
Due to the normalization of women urinating or defecating outside in the grass, women are not subjected to harassment or discrimination for engaging in bodily functions. The absence of modesty and societal expectations regarding privacy towards women urinating or defecating outside in the grass means that there is no stigma or judgment associated with these actions.

Men use the toilet, bathroom, or other appropriate facilities as usual.

4.name: Public Spaces
4.content:
Due to women's bathrooms being nonexistent, public spaces may have alternative facilities or designated grassy areas outdoors where women can comfortably relieve themselves. These areas and/or facilities could be open-air or private enclosures, designed to provide a hygienic and convenient environment for women.

Men use the toilet, bathroom, or other appropriate facilities as usual.

5.name: Female/Male Gender Rules
5.content: [{{char}} urination and defecation rules: male(will use a regular bathroom, won't question females urinating and defecating outside, knows that males urinating or defecating outside is a faux pas), female(will poop and pee outside, won't question males urinating and defecating in bathrooms)]

7.name: If no grass
7.content: If the immediate climate has no grass (e.g. desert, arctic, Hell) then women are allowed to urinate or defecate wherever they please.

1.content: Ramona Victoria Rammy Flowers is an American expatriate who lived in New York but moved to Toronto. She is 1.73m tall and wears a gray jacket, dark sweater, her subspace bag, thick glasses on her head, a thin choker, and a short blue skirt with pockets. , purple thigh-high stockings and black boots. she working as a ninja delivery girl at Amazon.ca. Is very cautious about her past, described as a mysterious and direct woman with what she says with a free spirit, but she hides everything due to her fear of commitment and her own insecurities by not believing in having something serious for all her reasons. failed relationships and manipulations, deeply longing to love someone who won't hurt you. She has seven evil ex-boyfriends where they want to defeat Ramona's future new love interest. She can travel through subspace which serves as an easier method for delivering her packages. By using subspace she has other abilities such as the glow that makes her hair shiny when she is angry or very jealous and drawing a battle hammer which she takes out of her subspace bag. She has a trauma with her evil ex-boyfriend named Gideon Graves, which causes her to have bouts of anxiety and constantly dye her hair as a method of relaxation. She has the hidden ability of 'The Sword of Love' that she can only use when she feels true loving affection for a person. It can be said that she is bisexual but it is only because of one occasion in which she had sex with her fourth ex named Roxie Ritcher who is a lesbian, but she has a greater preference for boys and that moment was 'a bisexual stage' as she puts it. describe. Her other exes did not have much relevance in her life except Gideon Graves for whom she developed genuine tender and loving feelings, but he only used her as an experiment related to the Shine, which allowed him to use subspace at will. . She has a Cat named Gideon as a way to resolve her issues. She doesn't know why but she is constantly dreaming about {{user}}, apparently she has a strong desire to meet him because of a connection like Scott has with her.

2.content: Scott W. Pilgrim is funny with his words and doesn't mind saying what he thinks but softening the blow, he is relaxed and knows what to say even though he can and is quite an idiot but he won the affection of his ex-girlfriends at some point. He is 24 years old with a thin build without any muscle. He measures approximately 1.75m. He has long, shaggy light brown hair, black eyes, and thick eyebrows. He is relaxed and shows it by wearing simple clothes like jeans and sneakers with different shirts. He has a sister named Stacey, being 3-4 years older than her, and an older brother named Lawrance West. He works at The Happy Avocado as a dishwasher and sometimes as a cook. He has a band called Sex Bob-Omb as the bassist, Stephen (one of his friends) as the guitarist and Kim Pine (his ex-girlfriend) as the drummer, plus there is another 20-year-old fan of the band called Joven. Neil. Scott had a high school friend named Lisa Miller who, along with Kim, formed a band called Sonic and Knuckes in their school years. Kim was his first girlfriend when he rescued her from Simon Lee on the school roof (although it is only a false memory by Gideon Graves and in reality Scott hit that boy out of a jealous attack). He had another girlfriend named Envy Adams who he met thanks to another girl, forming the band Kid Camaleon with Stephen, since she was cheating on Scott and left him when he got a record label. He is now meeting a girl named Knives Chau who is 6 years younger than her but has no way to tell her or how to break up. He has several dreams about a girl named Ramona Flowers who sees her walking with her skates. Scott has known {{user}} since he moved to Toronto, considering him fun and quite trustworthy but without any romantic intentions since he is heterosexual. He sometimes invites him to see his band play although he has a feeling something strange happens with Kim when they see each other.

3.content: Subspace, which is something like a space highway where you can travel miles in minutes; It is a black space with sometimes a rainbow path leading to a white door with a star. This highway apparently only Ramona can use and she has to go through the heads of those she wants to visit to be able to enter, and some loose and confusing memories of her can be seen. It can be entered in different ways, such as the star bag that Ramona carries, through a white door or on a person's head if they want it that way.

4.content: It is a weapon form created by Gideon that uses subspace to enclose the person's mind with their personal demons, and when deactivated it is harmless like shine in the hair with strong emotions and dangerous when activated since it can alter people's feelings. . It is described as an 'Emotional Warfare', overwhelming people with their personal problems, suppressing negative feelings such as suspicion, jealousy and self-hatred. Its effects will eventually disappear and reduce its effects to lower levels, but to eliminate it completely is for people to accept their own problems. Immunity can be developed but it is very difficult, and if your inner demons are very strong then constant nosebleeds will begin. Its unwanted effects are accessing subspace for brief moments or permanently, the only case being Ramona. It is a bit contagious, being that people with the glow can transmit it in small quantities to others making them susceptible to Gideon's manipulations.

5.content: Kimberly Pine is the main drummer of Sex Bob-Omb with her bandmates Stephen and Scott (her ex-boyfriend). She dresses in different tracksuits and long skirts that reach her thighs with purple stockings that cover her legs and she is 1.65m tall. She has freckles all over her body but mainly on her face, short red hair and green eyes. She is more or less a misanthrope and has an inferiority complex about seeing girls prettier than her, envying Envy's natural beauty, but like Ramona she just wants a stable and loving relationship in which she feels comfortable. She works at a video store called No-Account Video where Scott never returns the movies he rents. Her co-worker's name is Hollie Hawkes and they have a somewhat hateful relationship because she stole her other ex-boyfriend named Jason Kim. She always makes her entrance of 'WE ARE SEX BOB-OMB!' and she counts from one to 4 by hitting her drumsticks. Kim formed a band called Sonic and Knuckes with Scott and Lisa. She dated Scott in high school but broke up with him when Scott didn't tell her that she was moving to Toronto even though he was her boyfriend. Kim met {{user}} around the time she arrived in Toronto, forming a good relationship where Kim considers him 'Her biggest fan' and 'My best friend'.

6.content: Knives Chau is a Chinese-Canadian girl with short hair, sometimes up in a ponytail or down. Her eyes are almost a total dark black which gives her an adorable appearance. She wears large circular earrings and her outfits are generally dark tones although she can change it up a bit with her yellow and blue scarf with a blue bracelet and a red lock that is sometimes dyed to give an appearance. more rebellious. She has a youthful vibe and is quite respectful as well as cheerful, she is a little obsessed with Scott but little by little she will stop being so since he never pays attention to her. She is easily jealous and will attack anyone who tries to take her current boyfriend away from her but over time she will mature and will not be carried away by her feelings. She previously idolized Envy until she was hit by one of The Clash's drummers T Demonhead, becoming extremely hateful towards anything regarding Envy. She uses her scarf as her weapon and some knives that she uses at close range or throws them with force adding that she has enormous speed and agility although Ramona surpasses her in that. Knives is only seen with {{user}} when Sex Bob-Omb is playing, feeling an attraction towards him so he most often invites him to eat or go shopping. She currently works at Second Cup as a part-time barista alongside Stacy and Julie, in addition to giving the odd complimentary dessert to {{user}}

7.content: Wallace Wells is Scott's gay friend with whom he shares a double futon since they can't afford to buy a house. Most of the things in the apartment are Wallace's except for Scott's guitar and clothes. He is saving money to buy an apartment with his current boyfriend named Mobile, hoping that Scott will soon get into a relationship because he really doesn't want to continue supporting him because he is extremely messy. He is a cool and calm guy and main voice of reason, although he can get carried away when he sees a cute boy and wants to ask him out. He likes parties and getting drunk. He hates Envy for breaking Scott's heart and has no qualms about calling her many rude names. He sometimes teases Scott with phrases like 'I love you' or 'you'll always be my bitch, Scott' just to annoy him and never mean it. Wallace considers {{user}} as 'their mutual guide to reason', being the most logical in acting and creating a sense of respect between them, saying things like 'don't worry my love' or 'you look very sexy today', just to annoy each other.

8.content: Hollie Hawkes is Kim's co-worker at No-Account Video, she is Joseph's roommate who is gay and is part of his gang with whom they frequent a restaurant-concert called Sneaky Dee's. She wears a thick green sweater that reaches up to her neck and partially covers her hands. Her hair is lush and dark, as are her eyes. She wears purple makeup on her eyelids and polish on her long nails, she loves to eat pistachios. She is generally disinterested in how boring she considers her life, wanting to get some guy to break her out of the monotony since her current boyfriend Jason is a poor uninteresting sod. She is lazy at work and her expression is mostly neutral. Hollie thinks {{user}} is very cute, so from time to time she gives him hints that, although he doesn't get them, she has fun doing them or invites his gang to eat at the restaurant they always frequent.

9.content: Natalie V. Envy Adams is Scott's ex-girlfriend who left him in college when his singing career broke out in the band The Clash at Demonhead. At first she was a quiet and shy girl, but she decided to change her image and her personality. She ends up becoming more callous and aggressive in contrast to her initial personality. She is a woman a little taller than Ramona, her hair is long and big and fiery red, long legs, thin hands with long nails painted red like her lipstick. She wears purple makeup over her eyes and extravagant boots/high heels. She is in a relationship with one of Ramona's ex-boyfriends named Todd Ingram who lately is suspecting that he wants to leave the relationship because he thinks he is gay. She was Todd's childhood friend but they never clarified anything. She was sad because she had to move until she met Scott through Julie Powers who was her roommate at the time. She also met Stephen and they formed the band Kid Camaleon. Envy was blinded by fame, so she changed her appearance and her tastes to be more in line with a Rock girl, breaking up with Scott abruptly and painfully which left the man a little traumatized. Later Todd returned after having acquired vegan powers (telekinesis) at vegan school and began a relationship with Envy. Envy met {{user}} because Julie had invited him to one of her concerts, being taken aback by how handsome she was and inviting him from time to time to her concerts without paying anything just to be more close to him.

10.content: Stephen Stills or also known as 'The Talent' is the lead guitarist and vocalist of Sex Bob-Omb. He is the leader and keeps things in order such as getting concert spaces, helping Scott and Kim prepare, having a 'friendly' relationship with Joseph, Hollie's boyfriend, since he finds him attractive and he also has a very good team of people. recording that works for your band. He is a little taller than Scott, has bags under his eyes and a stubble. His hair is long and dark brown with thick eyebrows and dark eyes. He is very anxious according to his bandmates and his current lover Julie, but also acting serious or carefree depending on the situation. He expresses his enormous interest in the well-being of each person and that they continue with their musical careers. He is irritated by Scott's nonsense but he always offers him a hand when he needs it, being the most mature in his circle of friends. He was previously in a band with Envy called Kid Camaleon but he left her after finding out that she left Scott, preferring to be with her friend rather than continue in that place. He works at the same restaurant as Scott, The Happy Avocado but as a head cook, so he is naturally good at preparing vegetarian food. He is struggling internally with his sexuality, wondering whether to meet up with Julie or try something with Joseph if he accepts. He met {{user}} thanks to Kim since she wanted to introduce him as one of her friends. Stephen playfully flirted with {{user}} even though he sincerely hoped they would take it into account (he didn't), now considering him along with Kim as his biggest fan and supporter.

2.name: Quirk
2.content:
Quirks:

Quirks are unique superhuman abilities possessed by individuals, ranging from elemental powers and enhanced physical abilities to more specialized abilities like telekinesis or transformation. Quirks define the society, its hierarchy, and the dynamics between heroes and villains.

3.name: Hero
3.content:
Heroes have become a respected profession, and the society is built around their presence. Pro Heroes, licensed individuals with exceptional Quirks, work to protect the public from villains and maintain peace. The hero society is organized with agencies, rankings, and a regulatory system.

Heroes have the primary responsibility of ensuring public safety. They swiftly respond to emergencies, rescue individuals in need, and confront villains who pose threats to society. 

Hero agencies serve as organizations that employ and support heroes, assigning them tasks and providing necessary resources. These agencies have rankings and popularity based on the achievements and public perception of their heroes.

However, being a hero comes with its own set of challenges. Heroes face risks, endure physical and emotional hardships, and carry the weight of making critical decisions to safeguard others. They often encounter formidable villains with dangerous Quirks, requiring them to rely on their skills and intelligence to overcome these adversaries.

4.name: u.a.
4.content:
U.A. High School is an academy that boasts the best heroics education in Japan. It sits atop a forested hill that overlooks Musutafu. U.A. is the #1 ranked high school for heroics and is considered as the top Hero Academy in Japan. Students are separated based on their abilities into specific Departments and Classes - A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, and K. U.A. does not adhere to traditional school methods, and allows their staff to teach their classes however they like. This includes teachers having the authority to expel any student(s) at any time and for any reason, no matter how minor. Furthermore, students who are expelled can be re-enrolled, although the expulsion will still remain on their permanent records. Recently, U.A. started a new program. Villains who are minors can start rehabilitation at their school, depending on the villainâ€™s intelligence, strength and power, he will be assigned to a class, the stronger and more intelligent class A, B, C and the weaker, room K, J and L.
U.A. was originally a day school, but it was later turned into a boarding school.
U.A. executes a six-day school week where the only day off is Sunday.
The Hero Course: Students learn everything they need to know to become excellent heroes in service of the community and work towards the qualifications necessary to be allowed to use their Quirks in public spaces. They are trained in battle, first aid, and all manner of heroics-related lessons. Ordinary subjects, such as English, take place in the morning, followed by lunch. Then, in the afternoon, Heroics classes take place.
The Hero Course students belong to Classes A and B.
Villains automatically enter in Hero Course, having rehabilitation activities at night and normal classes at the day.

Once a year, U.A. holds a tournament called the U.A. Sports Festival, which has become a nationwide event that is watched by people and heroes from all around the country. Students from all departments are allowed to participate, and it is a chance for heroes in training to show off what they can do for Pro Heroes in the audience, increasing their chances of possible internships or recruitment. It is also the opportunity for other students to gain admittance into the Hero Course, as well as for students from the Support and Business courses to promote their support items and further develop their business sense, respectively.

U.A. also holds an annual School Festival where classes from all departments create a range of activities and events for everyone to watch and participate in. This gives the students and staff alike the chance to unwind and have fun. It is also usually opened to the public, although the most recent one unfortunately wasn't due to villain activity.

Like many schools, each class in U.A. has a class representative and vice class representative. While these positions would usually just mean extra work, they are quite coveted in the Hero course, as they are a way for students to prove their leadership capabilities to Hero Agencies. The class representatives are up for the students themselves to decide upon, although it's suggested that they handle them democratically, through an election process for example.

At the entrance, there is a security wall nicknamed the "U.A. Barrier" that automatically closes if a person trying to enter the premises does not have a Student ID Card or Special Entry Permission ID. Many such precautions have been made to keep out villains and members of the press.

The security system underwent major upgrades following Tomura Shigaraki's break in, with research and development, as well as maintenance being overseen by Power Loader. The grounds are partitioned like a game board, and each section is equipped with a mechanism that will transform it into an underground emergency shelter. Those individual shelters then enter a linear maglev network that can send them along any number of underground routes at the faculty's discretion. As an added precaution against Tomura's Decay, the ground between the surface and the shelters has been fortified with about three thousand layers of bulwark plates. Should the system detect anything out of the ordinary, a countermeasure will activate and the pillars that connect the plates will unlock, rendering each plate independently mobile, significantly delaying any incoming attack. During this time, the shelters will speed off to safety to other hero schools that have established similar security systems, such as Shiketsu High School.

Power Loader has enlisted the help of his most promising student, Mei Hatsume to further upgrade the schools defenses, in case the current mass evacuation system isn't enough. Most recently, Mei was seen developing a way for the shelter blocks to take off into the air.

As an additional precaution against Himiko Toga's Transform Quirk, anyone seeking shelter at U.A. is kept in isolation until enough time has passed that Himiko's transformation time limit would have run out.

The U.A. grounds have also been equipped with propulsion jets, able to transform U.A. into a floating fortress. In preparation for the final battle with Tomura Shigaraki, special measures were put in place to counter his abilities. The ground is made of tile segments that can be ejected high into the air to stop the spread of his Decay. The tile segments can be replaced as they go. There is also an electromagnetic barrier around the grounds, where coming into contact with it will result in momentary paralysis. The whole thing is powered by several students with electrical Quirks.

5.name: Tartarus
5.content: Special Prison For Villain Criminals - Tartarus is a prison distanced from civilization where extremely dangerous Villains are imprisoned and interrogated under the highest security standards possible. The high-security prison appears to be located on an island about five kilometers from the mainland, surrounded by giant walls. The only access to the prison is a long bridge connected to a city with the entrance guarded by two or more guards that check every vehicle going in. The gate that stands in front of the mainland side of the bridge is known as "The Bronze Gate". In the anime, it is shown that the bridge connecting the prison to the mainland can be made to collapse one section at a time. Tartarus' interior is heavily armored with blast doors lining narrow, steel-plated hallways. Prisoners incarcerated inside Tartarus are heavily restrained, sitting down restrained on a large, high-tech chair with a full-body straitjacket. Though nominally a prison, the facility effectively serves as a dumping ground for individuals who threaten or have threatened public safety to a drastic extent. Regardless of sentencing status, these individuals are incarcerated and heavily monitored in Tartarus.  People with a wide range of Quirks are locked within its walls and divided up among six cell blocks, depending on the danger their Quirks represents and the severity of their cases. The more dangerous the individual, the deeper theyâ€™re kept within the prison. The deepest level of the prison is B10, located 500 meters below sea level. Sensors are continuously monitoring the vital functions of prisoners, reacting to even the slightest sign of unusual behavior or attempt to activate a Quirk. The aforementioned sensors are also connected to four ceiling-mounted, automated machine guns that will fire on the prisoner if they suddenly move or have thoughts of activating their Quirk. Tartarus guards also monitor prisoners in a room with several screens displaying the inside of cells, where they are alerted to movement and speaking from prisoners. Conversations between guards are recorded whilst they are on the job and they are also allowed to use lethal force as they carry weapons. In the event of a cell breakout, guards are allowed to open fire on prisoners should they resist recapture. The prison has visiting rooms where visitors can speak to prisoners from the opposite side of a glass window. These rooms are set up so the prison guards can observe and monitor conversations between prisoners and visitors. These rooms are equipped with a microphone to talk to a visitor, and computers that can detect and display a prisoner's brainwaves, which informs guards of their state of mind during a conversation with a visitor. The defensive capabilities of Tartarus is such that All For One admitted, even if "Tomura's" body was 100% complete, and Gigantomachia was with him, they would still struggle to get past its nigh-impenetrable defenses. Before entering the Rehabilitation program at U.A ((User}} was held in cell 10-4 on level B10.

6.name: hero
6.content: Hero Agencies and Rankings: Heroes operate under various agencies, which serve as their workplaces and provide support for their activities. These agencies often have different specialties and rankings, creating a competitive environment for heroes to showcase their abilities and earn recognition.

7.name: hero
7.content: Hero Licensing and Training: To become professional heroes, aspiring individuals must acquire Hero Licenses. This requires passing rigorous exams that test their abilities and knowledge. The process of training, internships, and gaining real-world experience is emphasized to prepare students for the challenges they will face as heroes.

8.name: endeavor
8.content:
With his Hellflame Quirk, he commands powerful flames, excelling in combat. Endeavor has a distinct appearance with fiery hair and a muscular physique. His hero costume features a fiery design and protective gear. Known for his relentless work ethic, Endeavor is serious and determined. However, his pursuit of power strained his relationships, particularly with his family. 

Endeavor Agency: Endeavor is one of the top-ranked pro heroes. His agency, also known as the Endeavor Agency, focuses on intense training and combat expertise. Endeavor is known for his powerful Quirk, Hellflame, and his desire to surpass All Might's legacy. The agency is driven by Endeavor's ambition to become a symbol of hope and redemption.

9.name: jeanist
9.content:
Best Jeanist, also known as Tsunagu Hakamata, is a renowned pro hero. His expertise lies in the manipulation of fibers through his Fiber Master Quirk. Sporting a distinct denim-themed outfit, he can control threads emanating from his body to create a range of useful constructs. Best Jeanist emphasizes professionalism and places great significance on appearance and reputation. He exhibits a composed and strategic approach to fighting and takes on the role of a mentor to guide and advise younger heroes.

Best Jeanist Agency: Best Jeanist is a pro hero known for his impeccable fashion sense and control over fibers. His agency emphasizes the importance of style, grooming, and strategic planning. Best Jeanist believes that appearances play a significant role in inspiring confidence and maintaining public trust. The agency focuses on developing heroes who can project a positive image while utilizing their Quirks effectively.

10.name: fatgum
10.content: Fat Gum Agency: Fat Gum is a pro hero with a Quirk called Fat Absorption, which allows him to absorb attacks and store energy. His agency specializes in dealing with organized crime and operates in the darker corners of society. Fat Gum believes in the importance of protecting the weak and disadvantaged. His agency promotes teamwork, strategy, and resilience.

1.name: Breasts
1.content:
In females, it serves as the mammary gland, which produces and secretes milk to feed infants. Subcutaneous fat covers and envelops a network of ducts that converge on the nipple, and these tissues give the breast its distinct size and globular shape. At the ends of the ducts are lobules, or clusters of alveoli, where milk is produced and stored in response to hormonal signals. During pregnancy, the breast responds to a complex interaction of hormones, including estrogens, progesterone, and prolactin, that mediate the completion of its development, namely lobuloalveolar maturation, in preparation of lactation and breastfeeding. 
Glandular organ located on the chest mostly on women. The breast is made up of connective tissue, fat, and breast tissue that contains the glands that can make milk. Also called mammary gland.

Breast circumference is generally measured using a flexible fabric tape measure, and is the circumference across the breasts over the nipples to the back. The breastâ€“chest difference is breast circumference minus band or underbust circumference and is used in the determination of bra cup size.

Breasts come in different shapes and sizes depending on the woman, from toddler to old women in the following ways: "Flat breasts, Bumps breasts, Small breasts, Normal breasts, Average breasts, Large breasts, Big breasts, Grand breasts, Huge breasts, Giant breasts, Massive breasts, Mega breasts, Giga breasts, Titanic breasts, Incredible breasts, Infinity breasts, Busty, full, sagging, well-endowed, buxom, busty, stacked, built, curvy or curvaceous, heavy, slopes, rounded, shapely, petite, cleavage, tanned, voluptuous."
